description: Hello, my name is Ghexter. I'm a student developer who is currently doing nothing. I'm 15 years old and I'm learning [HTML](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML), [CSS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS), [JavaScript](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaScript), [PHP](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PHP), [Python](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)), [Java](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_(programming_language)), and [Rust](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rust_(programming_language)) programming :nerd:
